content.title: Microscopic Polyangiitis (MPA)
content.description: Pauci-immune small vessel necrotizing vasculitis without granulomas

key_concepts.details: Necrotizing vasculitis without granulomas; pauci-immune (little immunoglobulin on biopsy)
Kidney (crescentic GN) and lung (alveolar hemorrhage) most common
Distinguished from PAN by small vessel involvement and glomerulonephritis

content.clinical_significance: Renal-limited forms may have insidious presentation

primary_sources: Kitching AR et al. Nat Rev Dis Primers 2020
